name: The Martian Monsters
overview: The Martian Monsters is a space shooter for the Commodore 64. It was developed by James C. Hilty and published as a type-in game in a Ahoy! 1986/01 (Issue #25). Shoot the monsters before they eat you. The monsters do not shoot themselves, as their goal is to feed on your spaceship. Good luck! The game itself was finished in 1985, but not officially released until January of '86.
